** {{nbt|double|absolute}}: Test the distance between the two points in 3D space.
** {{nbt|compound|absolute}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: The minimum value.
** {{nbt|double|horizontal}}: Test the distance between the two points, ignoring the Y value.
** {{nbt|compound|horizontal}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: The minimum value.
** {{nbt|double|x}}: Test the absolute difference between the X-coordinates of the two points.
** {{nbt|compound|x}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: The minimum value.
** {{nbt|double|y}}: Test the absolute difference between the Y-coordinates of the two points.
** {{nbt|compound|y}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: The minimum value.
** {{nbt|double|z}}: Test the absolute difference between the Z-coordinates of the two points.
** {{nbt|compound|z}}:
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: The minimum value.
